an5.208:1.3: Acakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti.
an5.208:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
an5.208:2.3: Cakkhussaṁ, mukhaṁ na duggandhaṁ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti, pittaṁ semhaṁ bhattaṁ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti.
an5.208:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane”ti.
